website_summaries.verdict: The Wave Inspire 11 maintains the tradition of providing stability for training and a nice shift from landing to take-off. Additionally, it remains to be very light for a cushioned and stable shoe, which makes it a versatile option for different distances at different speeds. A solid choice for entry level and dedicated runners.
pros: A large number of appreciative runners loved the super comfortable feel of the Inspire 11
Durability is a very nice asset of this shoe, based on some reviews
The blend of cushioning and support is unbelievable, according to most users
A very plush and soft Ortholite sockliner adds to fit and comfort
It runs light and relatively flexible despite the cushioning and support
It is not clunky or boxy like the prior model, noted a handful
cons: Some needed a break-in time to get the right kind of performance from the shoe
The price is a bit expensive for several runners
The forefoot is a bit tight for a few users

customer_reviews.title: They are support shoes ( which I only need in runs over 10 miles) but are extremely light weight and comfortable. Due to this pr
customer_reviews.text: I always run in Mizunos. These must be my 7th pair of Inspires. They are support shoes ( which I only need in runs over 10 miles) but are extremely light weight and comfortable. Due to this probably last a shorter time than other shoes....I estimate I get between 350 and 400 miles from a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M D

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are good!
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen arches so thought I would give these a try, first impressions are great. Arrived within 48 hours of ordering, colour looks better in person, the fit is good and they really feel secure and supportive on the feet yet also lightweight. Looking forward to trying them out properly
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great support, colour is very good too. I wear size 5 normally and ordered a 6 which was a good idea. A number more is better for running. I've just bought them and tried them a couple of times, so I don't know how they will be later on, whether they get loose etc. But for now I can only recommend them. Delivery arrived in time and package was good.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno Wave
customer_reviews.text: The only running shoes my wife will wear as she suffers with running related injuries in other shoes . She buys half a size bigger and removes the inner soles and replaces them with Sorbothane double strike for injury free miles.
customer_reviews.author: L. rathbone

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous running shoes for someone like me who needs a little arch support. I'm told I'm a neutral runner, but I find neutral shoes don't have enough support for me and my arches end up aching. I tried these on a whim and they're my go to pair of trainers now.
customer_reviews.author: BlogGirl

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, excellent trainers. I train for long distance event like marathons, ultra marathons & half marathons. I always buy two pairs on trainers to accommodate the mileage and these trainers are perfect. I always buy a size bigger than I am which is a recommended practice. These trainers are light weight, durable, comfortable and do their job well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a new pair of Mizuno trainers for a while as they are very light and comfortable. Suitable for my outdoor workout. So I was pleasantly surprised to find just the pair on Amazon and with next day delivery. More surprising (and very pleasantly so!) was the actual price I purchased them for. Greatly reduced from my original shop bought pair. Will definately be re visiting the site.
customer_reviews.author: Vanette Smart

customer_reviews.title: great supportive trainer.
customer_reviews.text: great trainer. always gone for mizuno wave inspire as I need a supportive trainer. The wave 11 feel just as supportive. I think the look has improved compared to the wave 10. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Miss H.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is comfortable and fairly wide which is good - lightweight too
customer_reviews.text: I am a size5 shoe and ordered these in a 5 1/2 and the fit is just right. Shoe is comfortable and fairly wide which is good - lightweight too. So far I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cool, cheer me up at 6am when im running.
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers. My second pair. With my first I hated the high back but now I think it makes them more comfortable. Very airy, machine washable (well, I do), look good, great colour. Sorted.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool and I like it
customer_reviews.text: My size is 4.5 but I bought 5 as following a running book saying "better to buy one size bigger shoes for run."and it is just as I expected. Looks cool and I like it!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: No need to 'wear them in' always a delight; )
customer_reviews.text: I always but Mizuno for my road shoes. No need to 'wear them in' always a delight ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kaz D

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. No blisters. Good quality. Would highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: maria D

customer_reviews.title: Inspire 11s worth a look
customer_reviews.text: I love Mizuno inspires. The 11 series are narrower and less roomy at the front than the 10 series. Fit well have ran several marathons in the inspire 11, very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, ran 5k on the day they were delivered. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Chattyali

customer_reviews.title: ... already have 2 pairs of these shoes and I love them so when I saw these for a bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I already have 2 pairs of these shoes and I love them so when I saw these for a bag aim price it was a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes and a great price, I've been running 3 times a week with them for 9 months now and still comfy as ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The toe box isn't big enough for me I am returning them
customer_reviews.author: toni steel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: always consistant and such fantastic shoes. have been using Mizuno for 11 years now. love the darker colours too
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the very best shoe for me this is my 3rd pair and have always received the order exactly as requested
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great light weight running shoe that suits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jayne Adamson

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes - I run from 5km to 25km ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes - I run from 5km to 25km and they're perfect for my feet and gait.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only run in Mizuno as they are soo comfortable. Good service
customer_reviews.author: emma sully

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers. You can feel the support. It's just a case of breaking them in now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good trainers
customer_reviews.text: I like the trainers, but they don't seem to give me the bounce I found from another pair I bought from this company. they feel like the tops of my foot are cushioned by air. Not overly solid on the sole either. They seem to elevate my my heels oh so slightly and push my foot over oh so slightly onto the outside when in them. I read the reviews and decided on these ones, out of about 5 pairs. I won't be getting these again, but I will look at the rest of the range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light shoes (great for a heavy runner like me with heavy strides)
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, well packed .. I have not run in Mizuno before, and it feels lovely.. it is not a narrow fitting (thought not that wide).. light shoes (great for a heavy runner like me with heavy strides).. excellent support shoes (moderate or light prontation) and I LOVE the colour too :) Highly recommended..And the price is super saving.. :D Big Thank you..
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Initially running they felt comfortable until the 2 mile point
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Mizuno for many years and this is the first pair that I've found very dissapointing. Initially running they felt comfortable until the 2 mile point. These made the soles of my feet numb and very uncomfortable, to the point I had to stop to ease of the numbness. I' thought maybe it was because they were new but I've ran in them a few times now and the same issue at he 2 mile point the soles of my feet went numb yet again. Very dissapointed as I've lost my money on these, can't even wear them for any sport.
customer_reviews.author: ad

customer_reviews.title: If the price is right buy 'em.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for myself and thought that they were very good for the price, then I bought a pair for my partner and she loved them. They are very lightweight and comfortable. Look better in real life than they do in the picture and are very well made. The only reason for 4 stars is that because of the materials used to make them they are not machine washable. You'll be pleased you bought them if you got them on sale like I did, as you have probably noticed by now Amazon has become like the stock market with prices going up and down like a yoyo these days.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not as great as previous Mizunos I have had
customer_reviews.text: I have run in Mizunos for year and whilst these fitted as expected in terms of foot length etc, there was something about the fit that just felt different to previous models, and for the first time I got a bit of a blister! I guess unless you have actually tried on the precise model of a running shoe, you never really know....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, as some as I put them on my feet stopped hurting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these runners before so i knew exactly what size i needed and they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ciara carter

product_meta.title: Mizuno Wave Inspire 11 (W), Women's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Mizuno Wave Inspire 11 Women's Running Shoe delivers mile after mile of light, cushioned, stable fun. The Mizuno U4iC Wave midsole has been designed to be unlike other shoe technologies. When the foot touches the ground, Wave reduces and redirects impact forces away from it. Acting a lot like a car's suspension, it cushions and keeps the foot centred in the shoe throughout your stride. Mizuno are equipping different shoes to fit the unique stride of different runners, through the development of multiple wave shapes; if it's a local jog or running past the 20 mile marker, Wave will always feel amazing underfoot. Working together with DynamotionTM Fit, the materials and design of the shoe work with the foot as it twists, bends and stretches, allowing the upper to move with you. Flex eyelets help keep the heel secure by allowing the upper to stretch and contract as required. DynamotionTM Fit incorporates flex mesh which helps to eliminate the bunching and pulling that can cause blisters. The Inspire 11 also features Mizuno Intercool, a full-length ventilation system that removes heat and humidity, delivering a cool, dry and comfortable ride. SmoothRide is designed to give the most fluid, rocking chair-like motion possible in every step. Flex grooves in the heel promote natural movement from the back of the foot to the front whilst flex controllers in the forefoot continue it forward, giving the foot a more solid platform at toe-off. The Wave Inspire 11 is constructed with an AIRmesh upper to maintain a high standard of breathability, allowing the foot to stay cool. The X-10 outsole represents Mizuno's most durable carbon rubber, allowing for longer wear in high impact areas and enhancing traction at heel strike.
feature_bullets: U4iC Midsole - Cushioning compound which maintains lightweight, effective cushioning through the gait cycle, in a format that is 30% lighter than the previous AP+ midsole technology.
Wave Midsole - Provides an amazing cushioning to weight ratio.
Dynamotion Fit - Provides a fit that moves the way you do, actively working with the foot throughout the gait cycle.
InterCool - A full length ventilation system that reduces heat and humidity.

SmoothRide - Analysis of forefoot transition shows that for the smoothest, most efficient ride runners require shoes that flex easily at first and then become less flexible for an energy efficient toe off.
